name: Match getmyinvoice Banking records to Invoices and set the date

mapper.formula:
OR({Invoice ID}="{{2.value}}",
   {SD invoice number}="{{2.value}}", 
   AND({Contact SDCustomerNumber}="{{2.value}}",
       OR(
          offer_Invoice_status = "Offer sent",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Payment reminder sent",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Payment received",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Stripe payment - no invoice",
          offer_Invoice_status = "First Payment done",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Storno",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Fristverlängerung",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Manual check required",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Payment received - create invoice/check",
          offer_Invoice_status = "work in progress"
         ),
         DATETIME_DIFF("{{1.bookingDate}}", {Date created}, "days") > 0,
         Grand_total={{1.amount}}
     )
)

filter.name: No matching invoice with correct amount found

mapper.formula:
OR({Invoice ID}="{{2.value}}",
   {SD invoice number}="{{2.value}}", 
   AND({Contact SDCustomerNumber}="{{2.value}}",
       OR(
          offer_Invoice_status = "Offer sent",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Payment reminder sent",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Payment received",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Stripe payment - no invoice",
          offer_Invoice_status = "First Payment done",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Storno",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Fristverlängerung",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Manual check required",
          offer_Invoice_status = "Payment received - create invoice/check",
          offer_Invoice_status = "work in progress"
         ),
         DATETIME_DIFF("{{1.bookingDate}}", {Date created}, "days") > 0
     )
)

filter.name: Invoice found but  the amount does not match

designer.name: Invoice book. date + state (Manual check required)

mapper.content: ERROR: Match getmyinvoice Banking records to Invoices and set the date: error while matching invoice number: {{1.id}} - {{1.`Invoice number`}} -{{1.paymentPartnerName}}
